name: East Blue
story: Welcome, Pirate! You are about to set on an adventure to find the legendary treasure, One Piece
nav: press 1 to go to the Shells Town, press 2 to go to the Impel Down, press 3 to go Elbaf

name: Shells Town
story: You are on the first island, zoro is with you.
nav: press 1 to go to the Wano Kingdom, press 2 to go to the Drum Island, press 3 to go Baratie Restaurant

name: Baratie Restaurant
story: You have a nice meal and conversation with sanji.
nav: press 1 to go back Studio, press 2 to go to Impel Down, press 3 to go to Punk Hazard Lab

name: Arlong Park
story: You are in Arlong's Tewrritory he calls his boss Kaido, who beats you to a pulp.

name: Drum Island
story: Welcome to Drum Island, you found Dr. Tony Chopper.
nav: press 1 to go to Alabasta Desert,press 2 to go to the Baratie Restaurant, press 3 to go to Amazon Lily

name: Alabasta Desert
story: This is the hot and dry kingdowm of Alabasta.
nav: press 1 to go back to the Shells Town, press 2 to go to the Water 7 Metropolis, press 3 to Laugh Tale Island

name: Sky Island
story: You are among the clouds on Sky Island!!
nav: press 1 to go to Baratie Restaurant, press 2 to go to Impel Down, press 3 to go East Blue

name: Water 7 Metropolis
story: Welcome to the city of  famous shipwrights, Water 7.
nav: press 1 to go to the Impel Down, press 2 to go East Blue, press 3 to go to the Sabaody Archipelago

name: Enies Stronghold
story: You are trapped in the marine stronghold, Enies Lobby

name: Sabaody Archipelago
story: You are in the neutral land of Sabaody Archipelago, You learn the location of One piece from a former legendary pirate, Rayleigh!!

name: Amazon Lily
story: Welcome to the land of fierce women warriors.
nav: press 1 to go to the Punk Hazard Lab,press 2 to go to Fishman Island ,press 3 to go to the Wano Kingdom

name: Impel Down
story: You are in the Impel Down governemnt facility.
nav: Press 1 to go Drum Island. Press 2 to go to Alabasta Desert. Press 3 to go to the Sky Island

name: Marineford Fort
story: You are in front of the marine HQ, Marineford Fort
nav: Press 1 to go to the Shells Town. Press 2 to go to the Arlong Park. Press 3 to go to the Water 7 Metropolis

name: Fishman Island
story: Welcome to the island of fish and human hybrids, you meet Son of the Sea, Jimbei!
nav: Press 1 to go to the Enies Stronghold. Press 2 to go to the Alabasta Desert. Press 3 to go to the Marineford Fort

name: Punk Hazard Lab
story: You stumble upon illegal chemical weapons factory, Punk Hazard, be careful!
nav: Press 1 to go to Sky Island, press 2 to go to the Marineford Fort and press 3 to go to the Arlong Park

name: Dressrosa
story: Welcome to the island of talking toys and romance, Dressrosa.
nav: Press 1 to go back to East Blue, 2 to go back to Shells Town, 3 to go back to Impel Down

name: Zou Island
story: You found the ever moving island Zou. You see the giant ancient elephant, Zuneisha, carrying the island on its back!
nav: Press 1 to go back to Water 7 Metropolis, 2 to go back to Amazon Lily, 3 to go to Laugh Tale Island

name: Wano Kingdom
story: Welcome to the land of Samurai, Wano Kingdom, you might get stronger here.
nav: press 1 to go to Zou Island press 2 to go to the Arlong Park, press 3 to go to Dressrosa

name: Elbaf
story: The giants welcome you on their island, Elbaf.
nav: press 1 to go to Baratie Restaurant press 2 to go to the Marineford Fort, press 3 to go to Water 7 Metropolis

name: Laugh Tale Island
story: Welcome, you are in Laugh Tale Island, This is where the One piece was hidden!! You are now the Pirate King!
